name: Void Traveler
description:
This is my 2D shooter project.

Modifications:

  1. Created a new background using adobe illustrator.
  2. Created new background music using DPM.
  3.  Added collectable crystals .
  4.  Created a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  5. Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game.
  6. Added an instructions page
  7. I added a boss and modified his settings 
  8. and added an endless mode

Credits:

Created by: Thaer Alahrashy, using the Resources provided by Coursera/Michigan State University.
